title: #51: Missing Dial with Carson Ulrich and Ken Fournier
description:
The RCP team are joined by retired DEA agent Carson Ulrich and Pararescue jumper Ken Fournier who led the search for Cody Dial, the missing son of Nat Geo Explorer Roman Dial, in the Corcovado National Park in Costa Rica #HisNameWasCody #MissingDial

New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime
